name: figment
description: Editorial figure and caption pairings for mobile-first layouts.
author: Kenneth Ormandy <hello@kennethormandy.com> (http://kennethormandy.com)

scripts.styleguide: npm run clean && kss-node ./ examples/ --mask --css /figment.css --mask figment.scss --homepage ./README.md && npm run copy
scripts.start: npm run styleguide && harp server examples
scripts.compile: npm run styleguide && mv node_modules _node_modules && harp compile && mv _node_modules node_modules
